amendment.description: To stop corporations from financing terrorism.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3802 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 47 - 41. Record Vote Number: 194.
Amendment SA 3802 proposed by Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S10016-10017, S10029, S10038; text: CR S10016-10017) To stop corporations from financing terrorism.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3802 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 47 - 41. Record Vote Number: 194.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3802 proposed by Senator Lautenberg.
